comments.author: Eric Johnson
comments.body:
Created an attachment (id=12900)
Restores compatibility with 2.0 clients.

comments.author: Eric Johnson
comments.body:
I felt it appropriate to change the methods in URIException as well to
correspond to the fact that it was now overriding methods from HttpException
again.  Not sure that this was exactly the correct thing to do.

comments.author: Oleg Kalnichevski
comments.body:
> To my surprise Oleg says this was the intent

You know I am evil ;) I'd choose any day to break an API instead of making ugly
hack around, but Mike keeps me in check.

Changes to URIException look just fine to me.

I'll apply the patch tonight (20:00 GMT) provided there are no objections.

Oleg

description:
To my surprise Oleg says this was the intent, yet the Jakarta-Slide webdavclient
libraries do not compile out of the box.  Patch for that issue to follow.
summary: 3.0 not compile-time compatible with 2.0 library usage
